text:
sometimes, the proxy transformer seems to become confused by request parameters.
steps to reproduce:
set up a proxied lenya. add <urls type="relative"/> to the proxy transformer
setup in the global sitemap.xmap.
log into the default pub. click the "site" tab.
now when you hover over the "authoring" tab, you will see that the link still
points to ?lenya.usecase=tab.overview.

the problem vanishes when you remove the relative setting from the proxy
transformer.
creator: nettings@apache.org

text: I can confirm the problem with my proxy settings.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: The href attribute of the link is empty.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: I committed a fix, please test.
